ai-kv3.4:1.3_0: The one place rains residence together.
ai-kv3.4:1.4_0: And you don’t keep on doing it.
ai-kv3.4:2.1_0: The one place rains residence together.
ai-kv3.4:2.3_0: They enter and remain in the same teaching. There are stream-enterers, not having attained a stream-enterer. They have direct meditative experience of the fruit of stream-entry. And they don’t realize the fruit of once-return.
ai-kv3.4:2.3_2: endowed with the ethical conduct loved by the noble ones, endowed with the ethical conduct loved by the noble ones,
ai-kv3.4:2.4_0: And you don’t keep on doing it.
ai-kv3.4:3.1_0: The one place rains residence together.
ai-kv3.4:3.3_0: One day, a once-returner, or a once-returner. They don’t realize the fruit of once-return. They have direct meditative experience of the fruit of non-return.
ai-kv3.4:3.4_0: And you don’t keep on doing it.
ai-kv3.4:4.1_0: The one place rains residence together.
ai-kv3.4:4.3_0: The one who lives alone in the non-returner does not realize the fruit of non-return. With the one who lives in the non-returner does not attain Final Emancipation, one who lives without having entered upon the one-returner, one who lives without having attained the ending of defilements.
ai-kv3.4:4.4_0: And you don’t keep on doing it.
ai-kv3.4:5.1_0: The one place rains residence together.
ai-kv3.4:5.3_0: They live having achieved oneness in the same place as a perfected one, and a non-percipient. They haven’t attained perfection, but live having directly experienced the body. ...
ai-kv3.4:5.3_1: they are to be realized. They can’t realized that one which you should be realized.
ai-kv3.4:5.4_0: And you don’t keep on doing it.
ai-kv3.4:6.4_0: And you don’t keep on doing it.
ai-kv3.4:7.5_0: “When you know and see like this, your mind is freed from the defilements of sensuality, desire to be reborn, and ignorance.”
ai-kv3.4:8.4_0: “When their mind has become immersed in samādhi like this—purified, bright, flawless, rid of corruptions, pliable, workable, steady, and imperturbable—they extend it toward knowledge of the ending of defilements.”
ai-kv3.4:9.3_0: There is a wrong mind for the misfortune, I will get a defilements.
ai-kv3.4:9.4_0: And you don’t keep on doing it.
ai-kv3.4:9.5_0: Haven’t this hard ornament I’ve been accused by the naked ascetic and the bed, offered to us. And I drive (shopped) off all the way that is unshakable and false,
ai-kv3.4:9.7_0: turbling, both bad and violence, and thought, “We made a bed, chair, and uprooting, not being broken, our bodies continually useless, not to be compared to
ai-kv3.4:9.8_0: “A mind is liberated from traveling mind.”
ai-kv3.4:9.9_0: The discussion on unity is finished.
